Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Martha Sykes
Reviews.Content: I Purchased this item based on the picture and the description. However when it arrived it was nothing like I expected. The description stated it includes a 35mm camera and with a flashlight. What arrived was a compass with binoculars and a spyglass. Also the little purple pouch shown on the picture was not included. It is not a an adventure kit, but a 3 piece exploring kit. I was deceived by the item description and will not be buying from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Item not as described
Reviews.Author: Ajay A.
Reviews.Content: Should've heeded to the reviews. The item is not as described and listed at all. The package I got is missing the camera and the flashlight.

Reviews.Title: Camera not included.
Reviews.Author: Siri Traynor
Reviews.Content: The description of this adventure kit is false.  It does not come with a camera or flashlight.Package Contents:TelescopeBinocularsCompass
